Name: Lunar Blessing
Effect: *Target User or Target one Ally. Unique. If successful, spend 1 Will Point to activate. Complete Heal. Heal all Status Ailments on the Target. Reduce 1 success to all the Accuracy Rolls of the foe.
Description: Put your faith in the moon. Pray during dark times and it shall bring light into your heart, guide the strayed, and blind the creatures from the shadows.
